And so he stays propped up. Whatever the hell was wrong with him, nobody kn=
ew. Not even Roland! (Yes anyway) It was still a mystery! Ooh!

Meanwhile, =
Deemos looked around the battle with disgust.

Deemos: We've been here long=
 enough. Let's go back. Right now.

Deemos changes into a small jet that he=
 had replaced his beast mode with. (I'm changing all of my characters) He f=
lies back towards the new Mafia base. Holocaust reluctantly changes into a =
race car and follows, rather disgusted that Deemos ran...

  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday,=
 July 23, 2001 12:16 AM
  Subject: Re: Lynxiz


  --- Lynxiz ---

  Lynxiz =
frowns, not knowing what to do. Being a warrior and not a 
  exceptionally =
bright thinker, she props BH up on the wall, says a 
  few words, "Uhh, ok,=
 I've gotta go and defend this base so I'll check 
  up on you in a bit. Ok=
? Ok. Good." She leaves the room, and 
  heads for the exit of the base.

the ground

owing that

mm, you
  >   don't look so good..." She kneels beside him, and examines hi=
m,
  >   looking for a reason for his unconcious state.
  > 
  >   Meanwhil=
e, outside the Chivitron base, Lokk is still hiding behind
  >   the hill. =
He spots Windlord fighting close combat with Vampiza, and
  >   grumbles, n=
ot wanting to shoot and damage his fellow Chivitron. He
  >   picks out Ape=
wing, and his twin chainguns unload half a clip each,
  >   hoping to surpr=
ise the bot.
  > 
  >   Axis peeks his head over the pod, and spots Speed V=
iper. He fires a
  >   laser blast, then arcs a missile at the bot. Then he=
 crouches back
  >   behind the pod.
